description:
This dashboard provides basic performance metrics for mysql/mariadb.

Uses telegraf built-in plugin

targets.query: SELECT mean("uptime_since_flush_status") FROM "mysql" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("queries") FROM "mysql" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

select derivative(mean("value"),1s) from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Table_locks_immediate' AND "type" = 'counter' AND "instance" = 'status' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

select derivative(mean("value"),1s) from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Table_locks_waited' AND "type" = 'counter' AND "instance" = 'status' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("connections"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(max_used_connections) from "mysql" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("threads_connected") FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("threads_running") FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_received"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("created_tmp_tables"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("created_tmp_disk_tables"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("created_tmp_files"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("select_full_join"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("select_full_range_join"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("select_range"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("select_range_check"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("select_scan"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("sort_rows"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negatiive_derivative(mean("sort_range"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("sort_merge_passes"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("sort_scan"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("slow_queries"), 10s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("aborted_clients"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("aborted_connects"), 10s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("commands_insert"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("commands_update"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("commands_commit"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("commands_begin"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("commands_admin_commands"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("commands_show_status"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("commands_show_variables"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("commands_set_option"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "mysql" WITH KEY = "host"

title: MySQL Metrics
